levels.story: Juices oozing from tender, succulent flesh, the sweet aroma of fine herbs... The master cook made dishes of meat that none in the city could resist.
levels.ability_desc: A curtain and 0 flame orbs persist for 10 seconds. Attack power is increased to 150%. Damage is reduced to 66%.

levels.story: Every day, customers lined up outside his inn, waiting for their chance to partake. Even the king himself would sneak down from his castle to sample the master's art.
levels.ability_desc: A curtain and 1 flame orb persists for 15 seconds. Attack power is increased to 200%. Damage is reduced to 50%.

levels.story: But once he entered his kitchen, the smiling cook's face would grow stern. The meat he used was no ordinary meat...
levels.ability_desc: A curtain and 3 flame orbs persist for 20 seconds. Attack power is increased to 250%. Damage is reduced to 40%.

levels.story:
The years passed, and the cook and his inn disappeared from the town. But his
cleaver remains as gleaming and sharp as ever, waiting for its next master.
levels.ability_desc: A curtain and 4 flame orbs persist for 20 seconds. Attack power is increased to 300%. Damage is reduced to 33%.

levels.story: A long time ago, there was a small nation that was invaded by its mighty neighbor. The country was helpless as the invaders put its women and children to the sword.
levels.ability_desc: 1 swirl of black shadow spins out from Caim.

levels.story: In the small country, there was a brave and beautiful princess who became determined to save her homeland. She disguised herself as a dancing girl and presented herself to the enemy emperor.
levels.ability_desc: 2 swirls of black shadow spin out from Caim.

levels.story: The emperor, entranced by the beauty of the dance, immediately fell in love with the princess. But as he approached her, she plunged this sword into his breast and slew him on the spot.
levels.ability_desc: 4 swirls of black shadow spin out from Caim.

levels.story:
After that, the mighty empire fell into ruin and decline, and the princess's country was saved. To this day, every girl of the kingdom dreams of becoming
the dancing princess of legend.
levels.ability_desc: 8 swirls of black shadow spin out from Caim.

levels.story: Once upon a time, on a warm spring day, an evil dragon attacked a palace. He killed the royal family, the palace guard, and even the court jester, just because he felt like it. Satisfied with his work, the dragon settled down for a nap in the throne room, and it was then that a little girl walked in, holding a sword. She shook the dragon awake.
levels.ability_desc: 1 sword of light strikes down from the heavens.

levels.story: She asked, "Could you tell me where the king is, please? I have to kill him." Rather taken back, the dragon replies, "I’ve already eaten him." Hearing this, the little girl bow politely and said "Thank you very much!" Puzzled by her appreciation, the dragon asked, "Why do you thank me, little girl?"
levels.ability_desc: 3 swords of light strike down from the heavens.

levels.story: The girl replied, "The king you ate was not the true king. My dead mummy told me that he took the palace from my daddy. That’s why I had to kill him – to get my palace back!" The little girl wasn’t lying either. She really was the rightful heir to the throne.
levels.ability_desc: 4 swords of light strike down from the heavens.

levels.story: The girl continued, "Now I’m Queen, I’m going to kill all the people who let my daddy die!" The dragon laughed and said," Very well, little Queen. Then I shall bestow my power upon you and your sword." So they exchanged their beating hearts. Then the little girl took her sword, slaughtered everyone, and lived happily ever after.
levels.ability_desc: 8 swords of light strike down from the heavens.

levels.story:
In ancient times, this black sword once belonged to a mighty king who built a
glorious empire. Under his wise and just rule, the empire thrived and
prospered, and knew no equal.
levels.ability_desc: 1 magic shaft pierces the ground and conflagrates all those who venture near.

levels.story:
But a ripened fruit can only rot. Spoilt by their wealth and prosperity, the
servants of the king began to swell with pride--and fell into corruption and
depravity.
levels.ability_desc: 4 magic shafts pierce the ground and conflagrate all those who venture near.

levels.story: Powerless to cease the rot, the king's summoned a wicked god into the blade of his sword. He then began to murder his treacherous vassals one after another.
levels.ability_desc: 8 magic shafts pierce the ground and conflagrate all those who venture near.

levels.story: The god inside the blade reveled in the bloodbath. When only the king himself remained, the sword slew him as well, and the silver blade was dyed by the royal blood.
levels.ability_desc: 12 magic shafts pierce the ground and conflagrate all those who venture near.

levels.story: In a certain country lived a feudal lord. This lord was enamored of the hunt; each day he rode out to find animals to slay, his favourite hunting sword by his side.
levels.ability_desc: 1 shock wave pulses through the ground and explodes upwards.

levels.story: One evening, the animals of the forest gathered together in council. "We cannot survive much longer! We must kill the lord if we wish to live!"
levels.ability_desc: 2 shock waves pulse through the ground and explode upward.

levels.story: So the animals of the forest surrounded the lord's manor, seeking a way in. But when the lord saw them all, he danced with delight. "So, they have all gathered for the hunt!"
levels.ability_desc: 3 shock waves pulse through the ground and explode upward.

levels.story:
With joy coursing through his veins, the lord rode out and slaughtered all the animals till not one remained in the forest. By the by, the lord lived
happily on to a ripe old age.
levels.ability_desc: 5 shock waves pulse through the ground and explode upward.

levels.story: There was once a handsome young man who stole from village to village, seducing the maidens and promising his hand in marriage.
levels.ability_desc: 1 faerie spins about Caim for 10 seconds.

levels.story: Captivated by his charm and beauty, the young women gave him their land, their gold, their livestock, and their hearts. But at one midsummer festival, his victims met and discovered the young man's faruds.
levels.ability_desc: 2 faeries spin about Caim for 10 seconds.

levels.story: The incensed women vowed revenge. With the help of the King of the Faeries, they cast a cruse on the youth, dooming the suitor's still-living soul to be sealed within this sword.
levels.ability_desc: 3 faeries spin about Caim for 10 seconds.

levels.story:
Even now, from deep within the cold steel of the blade, you can hear the
pitiful screams of the young man as he laments his callous crimes.
levels.ability_desc: 4 faeries spin about Caim for 15 seconds.

levels.story: A circular-bladed sword owned by a noble family that lived deep within a great forest. It was said that the user of this weapon would be blessed by the gods with three lives.
levels.ability_desc: For 10 seconds, runes of the gods swirl around Caim and make him invincible.

levels.story:
The sword was originally designed as a tool for torture. Its outer blade is
sharp enough to bisect a man with one stroke, while the inner is kept dull
to inflict hideous pain.
levels.ability_desc: For 15 seconds, runes of the gods swirl around Caim and make him invincible.

levels.story:
Poison can be poured into the handle. As soon as the victim is cut, the poison
flows into the wound and causes nearly instantaneous death.
levels.ability_desc: For 25 seconds, runes of the gods swirl around Caim and make him invincible.

levels.story: So cruel was this weapon judged to be, it was banned by the old kings. Soon thereafter, it became infamous as the tool of assassins.
levels.ability_desc: For 30 seconds, runes of the gods swirl around Caim and make him invincible.

levels.story: An imperial archaeologist unearthed this weapon's blade from the ruins of an ancient holy place. Believed to be fossilized remains of some beast, the substance was incredibly hard.
levels.ability_desc: 1 great boulder of iron crashes to the earth.

levels.story: With great care and reverence, the scientist tried to sharpen the rock. But the substance was impervious to fire, to acid, and to all the tools of his workshop.
levels.ability_desc: 3 great boulders of iron crash to the earth.

levels.story: Driven mad by the unyielding substance that say reproachfully before him, the scientist smashed it against his head again and again till he fell dead of his wounds.
levels.ability_desc: 6 great boulders of iron crash to the earth.

levels.story: The darkly glimmering subsstance was the claw of an earth dragon, and only human blood can sharpen its edge. And so for ignorance did another scientist die.
levels.ability_desc: 8 great boulders of iron crash to the earth.

levels.story:
When the great shrine was built, young women were chosen to be sacrifices.
They plunged this kris sword into their own hearts. The blade glimmers with
the souls of its young victims.
levels.ability_desc: 1 crescent blade of light flies at the enemy.

levels.story:
The first sacrifice was a respected and pious believer. The pure woman was
chosen to serve as the foundation stone of the new shrine.
levels.ability_desc: 3 crescent blades of light fly at the enemy.

levels.story:
The second sacrifice was a kind girl of the village. Though sad to be chosen
for death, she consoled herself with the knowledge that her sacrifice would
help others.
levels.ability_desc: 5 crescent blades of light fly at the enemy.

levels.story:
The third sacrifice was a girl who made her living as a thief. She cursed the
gods angrily as her life was taken. At the moment the sword struck home, it
coiled and writhed like a wounded snake.
levels.ability_desc: 9 crescent blades of light fly at the enemy.

levels.story: A sword serrated like a saw, able to cut through enemy weapons. But with each use, vibrations shake the user's arm, causing the flesh to turn weak and translucent like wax.
levels.ability_desc: Caim turns invisible for 10 seconds and his attack strength increases by a factor of 1.5.

levels.story: Many, many centuries ago, there was a brave knight who fought and defeated countless enemies. But as he fought, his flesh became paler and paler.
levels.ability_desc: Caim turns invisible for 15 seconds and his attack strength increases by a factor of 2.

levels.story: Then came a war on which the fate of the kingdom hung in balance. The knight took the head of the enemy general and won the battle. But he had grown so pale as to be transparent.
levels.ability_desc: Caim turns invisible for 20 seconds and his attack strength increases by a factor of 2.5.

levels.story:
As the soldiers celebrated the victory, a single arrow struck the knight through his heart. But none could see the invisible knight, and his death
went noticed by none.
levels.ability_desc: Caim turns invisible for 25 seconds and his attack strength increases by a factor of 3.

levels.story: This sword is forged of a granite that burns red with eternal heat. Only those who enjoy the protection of the moon god, ruler of the cool night, may dare grasp the handle.
levels.ability_desc: 1 giant pillar of flame erupts)from the earth.

levels.story: Legend tells of a great warrior who carried this sword into battle. Roaring a battle cry, he charged into the fray, where a hundred enemy archers struck him through with a thousand arrows.
levels.ability_desc: 4 giant pillars of flame erupt from the earth.

levels.story: Yet not a drop of blood flowed from his wounds, and though arrows pierced his heart, his strength failed him not. His army was the victor on that day.
levels.ability_desc: 6 giant pillars of flame erupt from the earth.

levels.story: With the battle won, the warrior returned to camp. But in the instant he laid down his sword, he froze as cold and as still as ice. The protection of the moon god had finally claimed his life.
levels.ability_desc: 12 giant pillars of flame erupt from the earth.

levels.story: This sword belonged to a demented painter who murdered innocents every night and collected their blood. With this grisly harvest, he painted masterpieces the likes of which the world had never seen.
levels.ability_desc: 1 bolt of lightning smites down from storm clouds above.

levels.story: The painter had a dream. He dreamt that one day he would create paintings so powerful that all who viewed them would be at peace. Each day he painted feverishly, chasing his dream.
levels.ability_desc: 4 bolts of lightning smite down from storm clouds above.

levels.story: But none cared for his work, and he began to feel the cold, uncaring stares of others. Eventually, the soul of the sensitive artist was broken.
levels.ability_desc: 8 bolts of lightning smite down from storm clouds above.

levels.story: "Red! Crimson! Scarlet!" In a frenzy, the artist embarked on a rampage of murder and creation. It did not end until he turned the sword on himself and forged his last masterpiece.
levels.ability_desc: 16 bolts of lightning smite down from storm clouds above.

levels.story: A sword forged using secret techniques known only to one family. The family's secret was jealously guarded, and no stranger was allowed to learn it.
levels.ability_desc: For 10 seconds, a magic shield envelops Caim, allowing him to move at great speed.

levels.story: Hoping to discover how the sword was made, a soldier from an enemy kingdom joined the family. His plan was to steal the secret and return it to his own country.
levels.ability_desc: For 15 seconds, a magic shield envelops Caim, allowing him to move at great speed.

levels.story: But the young soldier fell in love with the family's daughter, and he could not bear to part from her. He confessed his plot, and begged her to flee with him back to his country.
levels.ability_desc: For 15 seconds, a magic shield envelops Caim, allowing him to move at blazing speed.

levels.story: But when the daughter heard his scheme, she murdered the soldier and then took her own life. And so was the secret of the sword kept within the family.
levels.ability_desc: For 15 seconds, a magic shield envelops Caim, allowing him to move at unholy speed.
